Source: src/getListOfElements.js

/**
 * Get list of html elements under the touch / x y coordinates
 * todo: apply filtering here?
 * @param {number} x 
 * @param {number} y 
 * @param {object} target 
 * @returns {array} list of objects at these coordinates -- not strictly an array?
 */

const getListOfElements = function(x, y, target=document) {
    let output = target.elementsFromPoint(x, y);
    output = Array.from(output).filter(x=>this.matchActions(x));
    output = output.slice(0,this.depth);
    return output;
}

module.exports = getListOfElements;
